title: John Burnet of Barns: A Romance
author: Buchan, John
snippet: At the top of the knowe above Symington I halted, for therebefore my eyes were the blue hills of Tweeddale.

title: Rab and His Friends and Other Papers
author: Brown, John
snippet: It was to Symington, four miles off,--a quiet little churchyard, lying in the shadow of Tinto; a place where she herself had wished to be laid.

title: Rambles in Europe ... With historical facts relating to Scotch-American families, gathered in Scotland and the North of Ireland ... Illustrated
author: Morrison, Leonard Allison.
snippet: After a four-hours ride from Gretna Junction,through a section rich in history and beautiful inscenery, and passing through Moffatt, Symington,and other interesting towns, we entered the finelysituated city of Peebles, on the banks of theTweed, and secluded among the Scottish hills.
